description: Just 25 minutes is all you need to whip up this prawn salad recipe. Grilled corn and capsicum add a lovely smokiness to this Mexican-inspired dish.
name: Mexican-Style Prawn Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g black beans no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Using a sharp knife, remove kernels from cobs in chunks. Place beans, lettuce, capsicum, corn, prawns and coriander in a large bowl and toss to combine. Season with pepper. Serve salad with lime wedges and drizzled with aioli mixture.
